Package assign4

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Administrator
    Administrator class that extends Employee.
    AdminView
    AdminView that extends ConsoleUserInterface
    BusyThread
    BusyThread class that implements concurrency by printing out '.' to simulate a progress bar.
    CommunicationMngr
    CommunicationMngr which implements Serializable and handles communication between the customer and the Dealership.
    ConsoleUserInterface
    Abstract class that represents a Console User Interface.
    Customer
    Customer class that extends User.
    CustomerView
    The customer console user interface.
    Dealership
    Dealership class that implements Serializable and acts as the hub for the dealership program.
    Employee
    Employee class that extends User.
    EmployeeView
    EmployeeView class that extends ConsoleUserInterface.
    GeneralView
    GeneralView class that extends ConsoleUserInterface and implements Serializable
    Message
    Message class that implements Serializable.
    Motorcycle
    Motorcycle class that extends Vehicle
    PassengerCar
    PassengerCar class that extends Vehicle
    Purchase
    Purchase class that extends Transaction
    Sale
    Sale class that extends Transaction
    Supplier
    Supplier class that extends User.
    Transaction
    Transaction abstract class that implements Serializable.
    TransRecords
    TransRecords class that implements Serializable.
    Truck
    Truck class that extends Vehicle.
    User
    User abstract class that implements Serializable
    UserRecords
    UserRecords class that implements Serializable.
    Vehicle
    Vehicle abstract class implements Serializable.
    VehicleInventory
    VehicleInventory class that implements Serializable.
